comments.en:
Doesn't seem to print without its "Windows Printing System". Connected to a Windows box the software emulates Laserjet2. This allows you to print via Samba with 300x300 dpi.
Keep in mind that there is no support for any Windows but Win95 and Win3.1(1).
Prints out completely black pages if Windows Box has not enough memory available.
Important! Mind the "W", there's a EPL-5500 without "W", too, this one might work.
